thread.title: BRIEF-SINA Reports Q1 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share Of $0.47

title: BRIEF-SINA Reports Q1 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share Of $0.47
text:
May 9, 2018 / 9:46 AM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-SINA Reports Q1 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share Of $0.47 Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - SINA Corp:
* SINA REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 UNAUDITED FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.47 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.38
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.42 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $433.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY NON-GAAP NET REVENUES INCREASED 59% YEAR-OVER-YEAR TO $438.1 MILLION
* QTRLY ADVERTISING REVENUES INCREASED 61% YEAR-OVER-YEAR TO $367.1 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
